actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a refundable tax credit for health insurance premiums.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a refundable income tax credit for health insurance premiums paid for the medical care of the taxpayer or his dependents during the taxable year. Limits the amount of such credit to $750.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a refundable tax credit for health insurance premiums.
